docs.snippet: One by one, several Federal Reserve officials have signaled in recent days that the Fed is ready to resume raising interest rates as soon as this month. The question is whether the official who matters most — Chair Janet Yellen — will ...
docs.lead_paragraph: One by one, several Federal Reserve officials have signaled in recent days that the Fed is ready to resume raising interest rates as soon as this month. The question is whether the official who matters most — Chair Janet Yellen — will add her own voice to that impression.

headline.main: Yellen to Speak After Fed Officials Hint Rate Hike Is Near
headline.print_headline: Yellen to Speak After Fed Officials Hint Rate Hike Is Near
